author: danj
msg: Created getAttribute() that allows caller to get the value of a qualified attribute (QName) with
only one line of code instead of 3-4 (DOM's getAttribute*() methods only use strings, which require
breaking the QName apart). This type of attribute is used a lot in WSRMD.
